revised_title: Low Temperature Specific Heats of AgCd and AgPd Alloys: A Study of Electronic Structure
tldr: This study investigates the low temperature specific heats of AgCd and AgPd alloys, providing insights into their electronic structures. The research explores the effects of adding Cd or Pd to silver, and the specific heat data reveal a slow rise in electronic specific heat in both cases. The results challenge the rigid band model and propose an alternative model based on a comparison of specific heats with Mossbauer data.
